name: Barbie Color Creations
summary: Join “Brooklyn” and “Malibu” on a colorful adventure in painting, sketching, designing and more! Explore an ever expanding bedroom of coloring books, tools, designs, locations and items. Bring Barbie’s memories to life with creative design challenges. Embark on a creative journey by customizing items and characters from your favorite Barbie movies and series, then save your designs as stickers and play with them in 2D locations. Earn unique rewards for completing design stories, and use them to decorate your personal studio. Download any drawing as an image to your device, so you can show it off to your friends and family.
